description.value:
Requirements You are wielding a melee weapon that deals
piercing damage.

You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

Make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} with the required weapon. If the Strike hits and deals damage, your target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} until they successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape}, you attack with the required weapon, or you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.wQYmDStjdjn0I26t]{Release} the required weapon, whichever comes first.

When the target is no longer grabbed, they take persistent bleed damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice.
